name: The Knock-Out Punch
description:
The Knock-Out Punch!

A game where you are in an epic boxing match and must get the knock out, or The Knock-Out Punch!

TKOP With Jaid

The game starts at the end of an intense match between two fighters chosen. You then input the combos connected to your fighter to power up your KO POWER meter. Once you have enough KO POWER, you can press your attack button to take a jab at your opponent. Or you could max out your KO POWER meter and press your Knock-Out button to Knock-Out your opponent in one hit! (Unless they dodge (To be added)) All animation of the players have been motion captured by JW.Berry! 

Meet the Fighters: Apen Fighter, Actor in #POLA

Apen is a character JW.Berry made for a short animation he is planning to make with Apen and three other of his kind. The film will be called POLA.

Jaid Fighter, Robot

Jaid is a character made from the motion capture skeleton of JW.Berry himself! So Jaid is very much created to be the best fitted for this game! He seems to act like he knows though >.>

There are more characters to come.
